objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#CE1126;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#8B0000;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accent' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD700;stop-opacity:0.3'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFA500;stop-opacity:0.3'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg)'/><path d='M0,0 L1080,0 L540,540 Z' fill='url(#accent)'/><path d='M0,1080 L1080,1080 L540,540 Z' fill='url(#accent)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='#000000' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='#000000' opacity='0.15'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='200' fill='#000000' opacity='0.2'/></svg>

product_details.description: Product Description          The chip that packs a flavorful punch with the classic crunch. Boldly seasoned with three cheeses, tomatoes, onions and a savory blend of spices. Indulge yourself or share with large gatherings.             Manufacturer Contact Information          Plano, Tx 75024-4099 Pack of 64, 1.75 ounce large single serving bags (total of 112 ounces) Doritos tortilla chips with classic nacho cheese flavor Made of whole corn; flavorings feature real cheddar cheese Crunchy straight from the bag or after scooping up dip or salsa Ships in Certified Frustration Free Packaging Brand - Doritos ** Flavor - Nacho Cheese ** Unit Count - 112.0 Ounce ** Number of Items - 64 ** Type - Tortilla Chip **

banner_details:
This banner features a bold and vibrant marketing design for a snack product. The background uses a high-contrast red and dark maroon gradient with radiating circular accents in low-opacity black tones, supplemented by triangular overlays for depth. At the top-left, the layer labeled **heading** presents a bold, playful text in bright yellow. Directly below it, **subheading** uses a futuristic white font to highlight the brand name. The product image (referenced by **product_image**) is scaled and angled slightly, centered for prominence. The **price** layer, in a large yellow font, dominates the lower-left, paired with **description**, which provides product quantity details. The bottom-right contains a rectangle (**cta_background**) with **cta** text layered above it as a distinct call-to-action in deep red text.

**Color Palette:**
- Primary Red: `#CE1126`
- Deep Maroon: `#8B0000`
- Bright Yellow: `#FFD700`
- Bright Orange: `#FFA500`
- Black (overlay accents): `#000000`
- White (text and brand): `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The Doritos Nacho Cheese product image utilizes a fiery and bold color palette to reflect the intense flavor and dynamic brand. The background is dominated by a rich, gradient red (#C21807) that transitions into a deep crimson (#7B1A10) around the edges, creating depth and heat. The midtones blend seamlessly with orange highlights like #F25C05 and yellow-orange on the chips (#F9A602), reinforcing the cheesy, spicy flavor. Contrasting accents like white (#FFFFFF) and glossy black (#000000) in the logo add sharpness and clarity. This palette effectively grabs attention while keeping the focus on flavor intensity and boldness. Ideal for high-energy banners.
